00001 #ifndef __MYRO_H__
00002 #define __MYRO_H__
00003 
00004 //This header defines general robot opitions, as well as the construction,
00005 //of a global robot variable. The global robot is created upon calling
00006 //connect and destroyed upon calling disconnect.
00007 
00008 #include "Scribbler.h"
00009 
00010 extern Scribbler robot;
00011 
00012 #define connect() \
00013         int status = robot.connect(); \
00014         if(status < 0) { \
00015                 return -1; \
00016         } \
00017     cout << "Connected to Robot\n";
00018 
00019 #define disconnect() \
00020     robot.stop(); \
00021         robot.disconnect(); \
00022         return 0; 
00023 
00024 extern void wait(double time);
00025 extern bool timeRemaining(double start_time);
00026 
00027 
00028 #endif
